name: Desert Wolf
overview: Desert Wolf is an action simulation game. The player is a fighter pilot. The game is divided into a number of single missions with a specified target, such as defending the base, destroying the enemy defense line, chasing enemy transport or bombing a hostile base. The game screen shows the fighter position, weapons/shields status and radar indicating enemy position. The player may use a few types of weapons, depending on the current target of the mission. The ammo is limited and can't be re-supplied. The mission stats show the number of destroyed units and shooting efficiency. The game has a built-in encyclopedia of military units. The game was exclusively released in Poland.
